mapper.select: SELECT notice_num noticeNum, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, notice_writer noticeWriter, notice_password noticePassword, notice_readCnt noticeReadCnt, notice_regDate noticeRegDate, notice_show noticeShow, rn FROM (SELECT b.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM (SELECT * FROM TRAVEL_NOTICE_TABLE WHERE notice_show = 'Y' ORDER BY notice_num DESC) b) WHERE rn >= #{start} AND rn <= #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM TRAVEL_NOTICE_TABLE WHERE notice_show = 'Y'

SELECT notice_num noticeNum, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, notice_writer noticeWriter, notice_password noticePassword, notice_readCnt noticeReadCnt, notice_regDate noticeRegDate, notice_show noticeShow FROM TRAVEL_NOTICE_TABLE WHERE notice_num= #{notice_num}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TRAVEL_NOTICE_TABLE WHERE notice_num = #{notice_num} AND notice_password = #{notice_password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAVEL_NOTICE_TABLE(notice_num, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, notice_password, notice_readCnt, notice_regDate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(notice_num) + 1, 1) FROM TRAVEL_NOTICE_TABLE), #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, '작성자111', #{notice_password}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE TRAVEL_NOTICE_TABLE SET notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_content = #{notice_content}, notice_password = #{notice_password} WHERE notice_num = #{notice_num}
UPDATE TRAVEL_NOTICE_TABLE SET NOTICE_show='N' WHERE notice_num = #{notice_num}
